Entries.spring_11.000: Vincent still hates going to the doctor, but he seems a little calmer after that lesson with Harvey.

Changes: wow, Mr Clint, that's so cool!!! :LavrilLayWow:

Entries.31032036/t 900 1800/A ItTakesAVillage_Be: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Penny 29 18 3 Jas 30 16 0 Vincent 31 18 0 Shane 30 15 2 Marnie 23 18 1/viewport 23 16 true/addConversationTopic ItTakesAVillage_ShaneAnimalCare {{MinimumDaysBetweenLessons}}/{{SkippableToken}}/emote Vincent 32/jump Jas 4/pause 500/emote Shane 32 true/emote Penny 32 false/pause 50/emote Marnie 32/speak Marnie "Ok, I'll get back to tending the shop.#$b#Have fun in class!$h"/emote Penny 32 true/speed Marnie 5/move Marnie -8 0 0/speed Marnie 5/move Marnie 0 -5 3/speed Marnie 5/move Marnie -2 0 2/speed Marnie 5/move Marnie 0 1 3/speed Marnie 5/move Marnie -1 0 2/pause 50/faceDirection Penny 0 false/pause 1300/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 13 18/pause 400/emote Marnie 20/pause 200/emote farmer 8/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/speed farmer 4/move farmer 7 0 1/speed farmer 3/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 false/pause 50/faceDirection Jas 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 3 true/pause 200/speak Shane "Hey @! We were just about to go into the barn for a lesson. Come with us!"/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move farmer 3 0 0 true/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/pause 400/playSound doorClose/pause 400/changetoTemporaryMap MarnieBarn false/warp Shane 11 6/warp Jas 10 5/warp Vincent 8 7/warp Penny 6 4/warp farmer 5 5/warp Marnie -100 -100/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/faceDirection Penny 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1 false/{{ShaneAnimalChickenPlacementToken}}/pause 200/viewport 8 7/pause 1000/faceDirection Vincent 1/move chicken5 -1 0 2 true/pause 400/move chicken2 3 0 1 true/faceDirection chicken1 3/faceDirection Vincent 0/pause 200/faceDirection Vincent 2/pause 400/move chicken4 0 1 2 true/pause 300/textAboveHead Vincent "Cool!"/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Shane "So, what's the first thing you should know about taking care of animals?"/emote Jas 16 true/jump Jas 4/speak Jas "They need food and water daily!$4"/speak Shane "That's right!$6"/emote Jas 32/move chicken3 0 1 0 true/pause 500/move chicken4 0 -1 0/pause 500/move chicken4 -1 0 2/animate chicken4 false true 700 16 17/speak Shane "It's important to give them the right food and in the right amount, so they stay healthy. Grass and hay are good, but bread is not."/speak Shane "Something else you want to keep in mind is-"/jump Jas 4/speak Jas "You have to give them space!$h"/speak Shane "You're ahead of me.$h#$b#Yes, you don't want to accidentally step on them. Also, if there are several animals, they may get upset with each other and fight.#$b#You don't want to be in the middle of that! So it's good to keep a little distance."/emote Vincent 40 true/move chicken3 1 0 1 true/move chicken2 2 0 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection chicken1 1/speak Vincent "Does this mean I can't pet them? What about the fair?$3"/speak Shane "That's a good point, Vincent!"/emote Vincent 32/speak Shane "That's a little different because-"/jump Jas 4/speak Jas "Uncle Shane and Aunt Marnie put the animals in the pens so they have space to themselves. That keeps them and us safe.$4"/emote Shane 32/speak Penny "Jas, it's good you know all this!#$b#Maybe we should let Shane teach the material though, for Vincent?"/emote Jas 60/speak Jas "Sorry, Uncle Shane.$3"/speak Shane "It's ok, Jas. I appreciate the enthusiasm.$6"/pause 500/faceDirection chicken1 2/animate chicken1 false true 500 16 17/move chicken2 0 -1 0 true/pause 500/move chicken3 -1 0 3/faceDirection chicken3 2/speak Shane "Speaking of petting the animals, before and after you pet them, it's extremely important to wash your hands.#$b#This is because of something called zoonosis. Animals can pass on diseases to people, and we can pass on diseases to them.#$b#Washing your hands before and after touching them helps keep us all healthy."/emote Vincent 16/speak Vincent "Woah. My mom always worries about me getting sick from animals. I never thought I could make them sick!$3"/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "Right?!$3"/emote Shane 20 true/emote Penny 32 false/pause 500/speak Shane "Hmm, I wonder... let's go outside and see if we have our special guest today. I think you'll all enjoy this."/faceDirection Jas 2/emote Jas 8 true/emote Vincent 8 true/pause 400/move Shane 0 3 2 true/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/changeToTemporaryMap Forest false/warp Shane 101 18/warp Jas 100 17/warp Vincent 100 19/warp Penny 99 17/warp farmer 99 19/addTemporaryActor BlossomDuck 32 32 108 19 2 true/faceDirection Shane 2 true/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/faceDirection Penny 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 false/addTemporaryActor White_Cow 32 32 106 16 2 false Animal cow1/addTemporaryActor White_Cow 32 32 95 17 3 false Animal cow2/addTemporaryActor Brown_Cow 32 32 102 21 1 false Animal cow3/addTemporaryActor BabySheep 32 32 97 20 0 false Animal sheep1/viewport 101 18/pause 1000/move cow3 0 -1 0 true/pause 500/move sheep1 0 1 2/pause 500/move cow2 0 1 1/faceDirection Shane 3/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection farmer 3 false/faceDirection Jas 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 3 false/emote Shane 8/pause 300/pause 500/faceDirection cow1 2/animate cow1 false true 900 12 13/playSound Duck/pause 400/faceDirection Jas 1 true/faceDirection Shane 1 true/faceDirection Penny 1 true/faceDirection Vincent 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1 false/pause 100/jump Jas 8/jump Vincent 8/jump farmer 4/jump Penny 4/speak Shane "There's Blossom! If there was ever a carefree duck, it's Blossom.$h#$b#It loves flowers. I imagine it enjoys spending time in gardens.$6"/emote BlossomDuck 32/emote Jas 20 true/emote Vincent 20 true/emote Penny 32 true/emote Shane 32 true/emote farmer 32 true/pause 800/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Maybe we'll see Blossom around more often!"/end
